remarks:
If a wff is true, it is true for at least one instance.  Special case of Theorem 19.8 of [Margaris] p. 89.  See ~ 19.8v for a version requiring fewer axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jan-1993.)  Allow a shortening of ~ sp .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-Jan-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 8-Dec-2019.)
